DataElement.preferredName: Weight Diet History Questionnaire Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe a diet that is beyond the list of choices captured in a questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity._The customary allowance of food and drink taken by a person or an animal from day to day, particularly one especially planned to meet specific requirements of the individual, including or excluding certain items of food; a prescribed course of eating and drinking in which the amount and kind of food, as well as the times at which it is to be taken, are regulated for therapeutic purposes or selected with reference to a particular state of health._The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.:Regular course of eating and drinking adopted by a person or animal. This does not include DIET THERAPY, a specific diet prescribed in the treatment of a disease.:The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Concepts.definition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.

The customary allowance of food and drink taken by a person or an animal from day to day, particularly one especially planned to meet specific requirements of the individual, including or excluding certain items of food; a prescribed course of eating and drinking in which the amount and kind of food, as well as the times at which it is to be taken, are regulated for therapeutic purposes or selected with reference to a particular state of health.
The aggregate of past events; the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present; a record or narrative description of past events.

Property.preferredDefinition: Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
